actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage. The target makes a DC 14 Strength saving throw. On a failure  it is pulled up to 5 feet towards the plesiosaurus.

special_abilities.name: Hold Breath
special_abilities.desc: The plesiosaurus can hold its breath for 1 hour.
